DOC.detailed_description: Four ambulatory adult postpolio syndrome , multiple sclerosis , cerebral palsy spinal cord injury recruit study ( one pathology ) . Inclusion criterion : - Ambulatory patient age 18 - Cognitive cooperative ability follow simple instruction - Independently capable understand inform consent form - Weight 100kg Exclusion criterion : • Cognitive disorder prevent subject understanding trial protocol follow researcher 's instruction 2.2 Trial Protocol The subject recruit rehabilitation department Hadassah medical center . Each subject understand agree inform consent form pretrial . The subject ' age , weight , BMI document . They receive 10- minute instruction use Up n ' Free gait trainer provide trainer 1-week duration trial . Spatiotemporal parameter gait symmetry record Hadassah gait laboratory , patient ambulates walk aid . Physical Activity ( PA ) assess use triaxial accelerometer-based activity monitor ( ActiGraph GT3X , Pensacola , Florida , USA ) , use preset sample epoch 1 . The participant instruct wear activity monitor right hip 7 consecutive day remove night time sleep water activity . At end 7 day subject return Up n ' Free gait trainer fill satisfactory questionnaire . Spatiotemporal parameter gait symmetry record Hadassah gait laboratory , patient ambulate Up n ' Free . 2.3 Data Analysis Estimates PA weigh 5/7th weekly activity weekday ( Sunday-Thursday ) 2/7th weekend day ( Friday Saturday ) within-week variation expect .
